name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Wayne A. SMITH, Appellant
docket_number: Emergency Motion No. 115 Capitol Appeal Docket

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Wayne A. SMITH, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 2nd day of October, 1997, the Emergency Motion for Stay of Execution is granted pending final disposition by the United States Supreme, Court of any timely filed petition for writ of certiorari.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
700 A.2d 1261
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Wayne A. SMITH, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Oct. 2, 1997.
Reargument Denied March 3, 1998.
